name: O.M. v0.0.0.0129
description:
Mixed rpg and other game elements in a slowly growing game.

The name Omni-Mori and you are in a frozen place in purgatory. What do you have to do? survive and maybe find a way out.

If you might like to show support I do have a few more ways you can help!
Share with thos who might like this!
Support me on my patreon! https://www.patreon.com/perieratAZAgorod?fan_landing=true
